statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 4 , -2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 4 \, x + 5 , -2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 4 , 4 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 3 , 2 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 4 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
